Copyright_Statement: All data from the Census is subject to Crown Copyright protection and is published under the Open Government Licence (OGL).
Methodology_Statement: The census is the most complete source of information about the population that we have. This Teaching Dataset is a 1% sample of data from the complete England and Wales population, which includes usual residents, short-term residents and students living away from home during term-time.
Methodology_Statement_Welsh: Y cyfrifiad yw'r ffynhonnell wybodaeth fwyaf cyflawn am y boblogaeth sydd gennym. Mae'r Set Ddata Addysgu hon yn sampl o 1% o ddata gan boblogaeth gyflawn Cymru a Lloegr, sy'n cynnwys preswylwyr arferol, preswylwyr tymor byr a myfyrwyr sy'n byw oddi cartref yn ystod y tymor.
SDC_Statement: Preserving the confidentiality of personal information provided by the public on their census questionnaires remains a top priority for the census. The Microdata Teaching File contains a 1% sample of people with a small number of their characteristics. Personal identifiers (name, address, date of birth) have been removed and potentially disclosive output variables have been either completely removed or have been aggregated to reduce the level of detail available for each record.
SDC_Statement_Welsh: Mae cadw cyfrinachedd gwybodaeth bersonol a ddarperir gan y cyhoedd ar eu holiaduron cyfrifiad yn parhau i fod yn brif flaenoriaeth i'r cyfrifiad. Mae'r ffeil addysgu Microdata yn cynnwys sampl o 1% o bobl sydd Ã¢ nifer fach o'u nodweddion. Mae dynodwyr personol (enw, cyfeiriad, dyddiad geni) wedi'u dileu ac o bosibl newidynnau allbwn datgelu wedi cael eu tynnu naill ai'n llwyr neu wedi cael eu hagregu i leihau lefel y manylion sydd ar gael ar gyfer pob cofnod.
